QuestData.Title: Svarnos
QuestData.Description: Excellent work on the island capture, $c. Now that we have claimed the island, we need to make these cellblocks useable for prisoners. D-Block has been especially hard to clear out. Unfortunately it has become overrun with demons of all sorts.$B$BWe have been able to thin out the demons but a large core hound has broken its way out of its cell and is wreaking havoc down there. I need you to kill him and bring back his collar.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Green never was my favorite color.
QuestData.LogDescription: You must kill Svarnos in the D-Block and return with his Cursed Collar. Svarnos can be found in the D-Block, just northwest of Baradin Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: Svarnos is finally dead? Looks like we can finally get to work setting up that cellblock then. Thank you $n.
